entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 3 except zero inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Periods of freezing rain inland this morning. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3 except zero inland. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain inland early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
